extendedInfo.description: Empower Federal Credit Union has gone Mobile. Canât visit an Empower branch?Â  Take us with you!Â  Our Android web-app gives users the ability to:Check BalancesView Recent TransactionsTransfer FundsPay Bills to Existing PayeesFind ATM & Branch LocationTo get started, youâll need to be an existing user of Home Banking and opt into Mobile Banking from that system.  Itâs easy to do and takes seconds. Once youâve allowed âMobile Accessâ you can begin to login to Mobile Banking from your Android Phone.The system will confirm your login information along with your device to ensure itâs really you.  Once you are logged in, you can view your information and make transactions safely and securely.

reviews.title: Great app.
reviews.comment: Incredibly convenient and easy to use. I love that I can see what\'s going on with my accounts instantly. Love it.
reviews.author: Dawn Johnson

reviews.title: Great for a while... but. ..
reviews.comment: This app used to be great. It hasn\'t worked in 4 or 5 months for me. Could we please get an update? I know for a fact that I\'m putting in the correct info, but keeps popping up with bad username errors. It\'s too convenient not to be updated!
reviews.author: Mat Dodge

reviews.title: Something wrong with app
reviews.comment: Sign in to app keeps failing. Website sign in works fine, app is malfunctioning for some reason. Message reads Bad Username/password. I use the same user name and password on website and it works just fine. Worked fine up until about a month ago.
reviews.author: Jodie Eischen

reviews.title: Lg optimus extreme
reviews.comment: Can\'t close app when finished. Seems to be a common issue amongst other users. PLEASE FIX!!
reviews.author: Mark Calkins

reviews.comment: Can\'t close application once logged off or it automatically starts to load by itself even when you are not accessing the program.\tGreat! It is about time they developed the app. Unfortunately there is no way to close the app once logged off.  Another thing, there are too many menu levels. Account balances should be shown asking with the transfer options and check lookup at the bottom. Might be helpful to label transfer button with \'Pay Bills\' or \'Make Payment\' or \'Credit Card Payment\' or \'Cash Advance to Account\'. or something to that effect.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple and effective
reviews.author: Karen Cosentino

reviews.title: App must be hard closed
reviews.comment: Samsung GS3 It needs a way to close the app when done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: ATM finder
reviews.comment: ATM location finder doesn\'t work with \"current location.\". I have to manually type in an address.  Crappy app.  Chase mobile app is able to find my location.  Using Droid RAZR Maxx.
reviews.author: ma bo

reviews.title: empower app
reviews.comment: ur app sux! fix it or il just switch to another cu or bank
reviews.author: Logan Belden

reviews.comment: isnt working past the login for me
reviews.author: caria pearson

reviews.title: Empower
reviews.comment: Nice app...does EVERTHING if need it to do for banking..! Thanks empower for keeping up with technology..!! :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Alecia
reviews.comment: Love it I\'ve been waiting for this app to come sense I\'ve started banking here!!!!!  Best thing ever
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pretty bad!
reviews.comment: Was hoping this appt would be easy to use but it takes ages to load each time you want to use it and you have to force close it. Disappointed! !
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Lost app
reviews.comment: Loved the convenience of being able to check accounts on the go.  Then all of sudden the app wont open.  Uninstalled and installed several times.  Still nothing.  Very unhappy
reviews.author: Shirley Walker

reviews.title: Much like the mobile website
reviews.comment: But the website closes. This really needs a quit button, or needs to close when you logoff
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Amazing Except the force close,  over all can\'t complain at all always works when I need it
reviews.author: benjamin watkins

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: Easy to use
reviews.author: Margaret tompkins

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: This app is great.
reviews.author: Zackary Race

reviews.comment: App is okay on my tablet and desktop. Terrible on the smartphone!
reviews.author: William Worthy
